BLRX There are 6 block trades for a total of about 80000 shares so far today Ive been watching the block trades theyre typically around 1015 thousand shares each Sowhy do they use block trades The answer is so that large trades between private sellers dont skew the market With that in mind why would the Market Makers put 80000 shares into 6 blocks and then make a 28000 share trade that lowers the price in public Just asking
